text: Hali wala wanhu wawele nawasigala kuli muji, nakamhola chilongozi wa walingitowa ngondo, hamwe na wanhu wahano walingumlonjela mndewa mbuli zilivinji. Nakamhola kahi yalingwandika yawele nayali yololela mijito ja kwandika wanhu wa isi walinguweza kitowa ngondo hamwe na wanhu wa heye makumi sita wawele nawalawa mgati mwa muji.
